headline: Disposal of sodium
text: Here's something vaguely amusing: a flash from the past captured in this newsreel film from 13 January 1947. This video shows the US War Assets Administration disposing of steel drums filled with 20,000 pounds of pure metallic sodium by dumping them into the alkaline lake, Lake Lenore, in eastern Washington state.
